Content:: Wijesundara Mudiyanselage Rohana Bandara Wijesundara (born 26 September 1977) is a Sri Lankan politician, former provincial councillor and Member of Parliament.[1] Bandara was born on 26 September 1977.[1] He was a member of Galnewa Divisional Council and North Central Provincial Council.[2] He contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Samagi Jana Balawegaya electoral alliance candidate in Anuradhapura District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[3][4][5]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Rohana Bandara - Wikipedia
